title: Jump the fence
creator_credit: Natalie Green, Lucy MacLaren and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Two young girls who feel restricted at home decide to escape in a gelati van. After a short burst of freedom they end up in Winlaton, a girls’ training centre.
creator_credit_for_label: Natalie Green, Lucy MacLaren and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
